author: LinkMarioSamus

text: This game is also great at making you feel powerful. A couple levels and new equipment, and you can go from getting your ass kicked by simple monsters to obliterating them, which feels awesome. Fast﻿ combat, charming graphics and an awesome soundtrack. I'll be playing Ys Origin next
author: SupraDarky

text: Finished this game yesterday, played through it in 3 days since I couldn't stop. It's the first Ys game I finish and this game sold me on this franchise. Loved it! I thought the difficulty on Normal was perfect, with some very hard bosses. Learning their patterns is part of the fun and you can really feel﻿ like you're making progress until you eventually beat them.
author: SupraDarky
